name: The Valspar Corporation
membership: Valspar participates in a number of associations, including but not limited to the European Chemistry Industry Council (CEFIC) and the European Council of Paint, Printing Ink and Artists' Colours Industry (CEPE).
goal: Valspar is a global paint and coatings company serving customers throughout Europe with packaging, industrial and consumer coatings.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and Technology, Transport
euInitiatives: Valspar's interests include policy and legislation in areas such as chemical regulation, environmental legislation, public health and food safety regulations.
